title: Penn State berated for lauding ex-official of Sandusky charity
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Local - Today 
UNIVERSITY PARK, Pa. – Penn State’s decision to honor a former board member of Jerry Sandusky’s Second Mile charity — a man who said... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
